#ifndef GZReadStream_h
#define GZReadStream_h



class GZReadStream
{

        BOOL eof;               

        BOOL isZipped;          

        BOOL error;                     
        int errorNumber;        
        const char *errorMsg; 
        

        char *buf;              // buffer with uncompressed data
        size_t bufsize; // allocated size

        char *bufReadPtr;       // readptr, points into buffer
        char *bufEndPtr;

        // gzFile
        void *in;               

        FILE *inFile;


        int getcBuf(); 

public :

        GZReadStream();
        ~GZReadStream();

        int Open(const char *infile);
        
        int Open(FILE *infile,BOOL isZipped);
        

        int Close();

        inline BOOL Eof() { return eof; }
        
        BOOL Error() { return error; }
        
        BOOL GetError(int &num,const char *&msg) 
        { 
                num = errorNumber;      
                msg = errorMsg;
                return error; 
        }


        inline int getc() 
        {
                if (bufReadPtr < bufEndPtr) {
                        return (*bufReadPtr++);
                }
                else
                        return getcBuf();

        }

        int ungetc(char c) {
                if (bufReadPtr > buf) {
                        bufReadPtr--;
                        *bufReadPtr = c;
                        return c;
                }
                else return EOF;

        }



};


#endif // GZReadStream_h
